summary: Email chain between attorneys Daniel J. Kaiser and Kimberly Lerner, with William H. Kaiser and an Assistant U.S. Attorney from SDNY copied, discussing scheduling calls regarding the Epstein case. The emails show coordination between defense counsel and prosecutors following a meeting.

keyFacts: Defense attorneys from Kaiser Saurborn & Mair, P.C. are actively communicating with prosecutors from the Southern District of New York regarding the Epstein case in July 2019.
A meeting occurred between defense counsel and prosecutors around July 13, 2019, which was described as handled professionally.
The email chain shows ongoing coordination for follow-up calls, indicating active case management shortly after Epstein's arrest.
Daniel J. Kaiser was in Boston for a deposition on July 26, 2019, while coordinating these calls.
